definition: picking up and dropping off/greeting and sending off/shuttle (transport service)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send

sentences.english: Sex one-inch colour photos of the students are needed.
sentences.chinese: 需辦理接送卡的學生交家長一寸相片2張。

sentences.english: Roundtrip transfer between airport & Kinabalu Park HQ.
sentences.chinese: 來回機場至神山公園總部之接送。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus services to and from Tai Po Market MTR Station is available.
sentences.chinese: 免費穿梭巴士接送往返港鐵大埔墟站。

sentences.english: Arrive at Lisbon's Portela Airport where you'll be transferred to the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 抵達里斯本的波爾特拉機場，專車接送至酒店。

sentences.english: Seaplane mainly responsible for the airport to distant island transportation service.
sentences.chinese: 水上飛機主要負責機場到較遠島嶼的接送。

sentences.english: Driving kids to and from school will add to pressure on parents.
sentences.chinese: 開車接送孩子上下學將增加家長負擔。

sentences.english: Roundtrip transfer between Kinabalu Park HQ & Gate.
sentences.chinese: 來回神山公園總部至登山閘口之接送。

sentences.english: Provide short and long-term fixed-line transport.
sentences.chinese: 提供長短期固定線路的接送。

sentences.english: Round-trip tranfer between airport and hotel.
sentences.chinese: 來回桃園機場到旅館之接送。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Shushan Culture Cemetery also offers free shuttles for tomb sweepers.
sentences.chinese: 同時，大蜀山文化陵園還安排了專車免費接送。

sentences.english: I do 10 on average a day.
sentences.chinese: 我平均每天接送10位顧客。

sentences.english: Muras re-arranged for an assistant to help him.
sentences.chinese: 穆拉斯重新幫他安排了接送人員。

sentences.english: Bao cubes receive as usual to send shellfish study at school.
sentences.chinese: 鮑丁照常地接送貝上學。

sentences.english: Most of them live in the city. We provide free commuter buses for the workers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分工人住在市裏，我們有免費的通勤車接送他們。

sentences.english: Does your hotel have pick-up service at the airport？
sentences.chinese: 你們的旅館在機場有接送的服務嗎？

sentences.english: He usually drops the kids off at school on his way to work.
sentences.chinese: 他通常在開車上班時順路把孩子們接送到學校。

definition: special (or reserved) train (or bus etc)/limousine/private car used as a taxi and booked via a smartphone app
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
to go to school/to attend school
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
to take the car, bus, train etc
to dismiss students at the end of the school day
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to look after/to attend to/to have in care
regardless of weather conditions/rain, hail or shine
to go out somewhere (relatively short trip)/to set off on a journey (longer trip)
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]
food and lodging/to stay (at some place) and eat meals (there)
